summary: The artist Antonio López tries to capture the sunlight hitting his quince tree all autumn, but the struggle seems futile.
cast: Antonio López|María Moreno|Enrique Gran|María López|Carmen López|Elisa Ruiz|José Carretero|Amalia Avia|Lucio Muñoz|Esperanza Parada|Julio López Hernández|Fan Xiao Ming|Yan Sheng Dong|Janusz Pietrzkiak|Marek Domagala|Grzegorz Ponikmia
title: El sol del membrillo
